attributes.action: overrule his friend and neighbour the Chancellor of the Exchequer and give Suffolk its money back
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Suffolk County Council should have received £140.95million from the Government in revenue grant this year. However the Chancellor introduced an unfair floor damping system, which has cost Suffolk £7.3million in lost grant. This is money the County Council could have spent on its priorities, vulnerable children and adults. We are calling on the Prime Minister to use his influence to ensure that Suffolk gets its fair share of Government cash.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
